short_summary: This contract is for the supply of OneWeb Satellite Services for a period 3 years plus 3 additional years, for the use of one or more departments and agencies.
description: This solicitation is being issued by Shared Services Canada (SSC) for the supply of OneWeb Satellite Services.
duration_in_months: For three (3) years, and as required.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Contract: SSC NPP - OneWeb Satellite Services

**Contract Number:** SSC-23-00021216:T

**Amendment Number:** 16

**Publication Date:** January 2, 2023

**Closing Date:** March 10, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

**Government Agency:** Shared Services Canada (SSC)

#### Brief Overview
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the provision of OneWeb Satellite Services. This contract is intended to supply a single service provider for a period of three years, with the option to extend for an additional three one-year periods, as required.

#### Description
The SSC requires a supplier to provide OneWeb Satellite Services to support shared services delivery to various clients. This solicitation includes a Statement of Work that outlines the scope of services required.

#### Eligibility and Registration
To participate in this tender, interested suppliers must register on the SSC P2P portal and submit their proposal electronically.

#### Key Documents
All relevant documents, including the Statement of Work and terms and conditions, can be found in the attached documents section.

#### Important Dates

* Amendment 016: Published on March 3, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 10, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: Upon award
* Expected Contract End Date: Upon expiration of the initial three-year term, plus any additional one-year options

#### Contact Information
Inquiries and submissions regarding this tender can be directed to Nathalie Houle, Shared Services Canada, at [Nathalie.m.Houle@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:Nathalie.m.Houle@ssc-spc.gc.ca) or 613-301-5101.

#### Attachment Links
A list of attachment links is available, including files related to the Statement of Work, contract terms and conditions, and solicitation instructions. Suppliers are required to access these documents through the SSC P2P portal.

#### Effective Date

This tender announcement is effective upon publication.

#### Closing Date Expiration

Please note that the tender closing date has already past, and this solicitation is no longer active. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your understanding. [1][2]

---

### Market Information

- **Free Trade Agreements:** This contract is open to suppliers from Canada and countries that have signed trade agreements with Canada.
- **Sectors:** Telecommunications - Satellite Services

---

### End
